name: At Dylan's Mercy
description:
A second short visual novel experiment, this time fearing Dylan the Bun's characters tormenting you after you find yourself unexpectedly reduced to a significantly smaller-than-usual size

I mainly played around a bit more with different transitions of character sprites and near the end experimented with figuring out how to add some sound elements. Still pretty happy with how it came out and I feel like I've gotten a bit better at using it again. One step closer to  being ready to try the big main project I have in mind sometime in the future.
